decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to create an aggressive strategy by utilizing the abilities of Satya, Aetherflux Genius as the commander. This deck includes a variety of low-cost creatures and disruptive spells to control the battlefield and apply pressure on the opponent. By including cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, Swords to Plowshares, and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain board presence. Additionally, the inclusion of Aether Vial allows for quick creature deployment and the ability to adapt to different situations. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature aggression and disruptive spells.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. With Hidetsugu and Kairi as the commander, the strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a strong hand and board presence. The deck includes a variety of counterspells like Force Spike, Mana Leak, and Spell Pierce to stop threats before they hit the battlefield. Removal spells such as Damnation, Go for the Throat, and Fatal Push deal with creatures and other permanents. Card draw and selection cards like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Fact or Fiction ensure a steady stream of resources. The deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent and win with powerful spells like Time Stretch and Sorin's Vengeance.

The deck focuses on controlling and disrupting the opponent while maintaining a high level of card advantage and tempo. It utilizes counterspells, bounce spells, and card draw to keep the opponent off balance and prevent them from executing their game plan effectively. The key strategy is to outvalue the opponent by consistently drawing cards and controlling the board, eventually overwhelming them with powerful spells and abilities. Lier, Disciple of the Drowned serves as the commander, providing additional card advantage and recursion for key spells. The deck aims to quickly establish control of the game and close out the match before the opponent has a chance to recover.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by countering and disrupting your opponent's plays while being able to manipulate your own deck and draw the cards you need. The deck heavily relies on instants and sorceries to keep your opponent off balance and prevent them from executing their strategy effectively. With Lier, Disciple of the Drowned as the commander, you can utilize his ability to recast spells from your graveyard, giving you even more flexibility and power in controlling the game. By carefully timing your spells and knowing when to counter or bounce threats, you can outmaneuver your opponent and secure victory through superior card advantage and board control.
